arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name(ARN) of the layer.

autoAssignElasticIps.description: Whether to automatically assign an elastic IP address to the layer's instances.

autoAssignPublicIps.description: For stacks belonging to a VPC, whether to automatically assign a public IP address to each of the layer's instances.

autoHealing.description: Whether to enable auto-healing for the layer.

customInstanceProfileArn.description: The ARN of an IAM profile that will be used for the layer's instances.

customJson.description: Custom JSON attributes to apply to the layer.

customSecurityGroupIds.description: Ids for a set of security groups to apply to the layer's instances.

drainElbOnShutdown.description: Whether to enable Elastic Load Balancing connection draining.

ebsVolumes.description: `ebs_volume` blocks, as described below, will each create an EBS volume and connect it to the layer's instances.

elasticLoadBalancer.description: Name of an Elastic Load Balancer to attach to this layer

installUpdatesOnBoot.description: Whether to install OS and package updates on each instance when it boots.

instanceShutdownTimeout.description: The time, in seconds, that OpsWorks will wait for Chef to complete after triggering the Shutdown event.

name.description: A human-readable name for the layer.

rootPassword.description: Root password to use for MySQL.

rootPasswordOnAllInstances.description: Whether to set the root user password to all instances in the stack so they can access the instances in this layer.

stackId.description: ID of the stack the layer will belong to.

systemPackages.description: Names of a set of system packages to install on the layer's instances.

tags.description:
A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

The following extra optional arguments, all lists of Chef recipe names, allow
custom Chef recipes to be applied to layer instances at the five different
lifecycle events, if custom cookbooks are enabled on the layer's stack:

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
